name: ExecuteSQLScriptsWithOutput
friendlyName: Execute single or multiple SQL script with Output
description: Execute SQL script/s with their output written in a .txt file
author: Baskar Lingam Ramachandran
helpMarkDown: Execute SQL scripts on the server and produce Output in a folder

inputs.name: ScriptPath
inputs.label: SQL script file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the folder where SQL Script files are present. If you need to execute a single sql script give the full path to the file including the file name.

inputs.name: OutputPath
inputs.label: Output file of SQL script execution
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder where output files are present. Even if you give the full path to an output file name the output will be of the format SqlScript.sql.txt

inputs.name: ShowOutput
inputs.label: Show Output?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to show or not the output of SQL scripts execution

inputs.name: RunAsUser
inputs.label: Run As User
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user under which the sql script should be run under
